body_html:
Thanks Adam, I tried and got the following info:

Unable to reset this GPU because it's being used by some other process(e.g. CUDA application,
graphics application like X server, monitoring application like other instance of nvidia-smi), please
first kill all process using this GPU and all computer applications running in the system (even 
when they are running on other gpus) and then try to reset the GPU again.

It's a conflict, so I have to restart the server.

body:
Thanks Adam, I tried and got the following info:
```
Unable to reset this GPU because it's being used by some other process(e.g. CUDA application,
graphics application like X server, monitoring application like other instance of nvidia-smi), please
first kill all process using this GPU and all computer applications running in the system (even 
when they are running on other gpus) and then try to reset the GPU again.
```

It's a conflict, so I have to restart the server.
